name: Puzzle Mana
summary:
In Puzzle Mana, you are a magician that travels a distant land battling strange and magical creatures with your spellcasting skills. Slide the colourful objects up and down or sideways to match 3 or more of the same colour. Objects have to touch horizontally or vertically to make a match.

Fill out the 4 Mana meters on your left to unleash your Mana Attack and defeat each monster. Use special powerup combinations to win the battles faster and clear out any skulls that appear to survive.
